title: INFO Leader crucial role in shaping legislation

content.question: A new president has been elected after running on a campaign of lowering taxes and reducing spending on discretionary programs but now must work with Congress to ensure legislation passes which achieves those goals. Which of the leaders in the diagram plays the most crucial role in shaping the legislation that the president wants passed?

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
